QuestData.Title: Preemptive Methods
QuestData.Description: There is an herb in these caverns that holds untold power, $n. Perhaps you wish to help me collect it?$b$bIt is a rare flower called Serpentbloom. I believe that in greater quantities it has the potential to prevent nightmares like Naralex's from ever occuring.$b$bUnfortunately, Serpentbloom can only be found in the darkest recesses of this place.
QuestData.LogDescription: Nalpak wants you to collect 5 Serpentbloom.
QuestData.CompletionText: I am eager to see if you can gather enough Serpentbloom.
QuestData.RewardText: You have done well, $n. Hopefully we can use these to prevent further nightmares.
